Title: Relates to reimbursement for dental restorations
Summary: Relates to requiring insurance policies and contracts, which provide reimbursement for dental restorations, including but not limited to, reimbursement for dental bridgework, to also provide no less than the same level of reimbursement towards the payment of a dental implant.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to reimbursement for dental restorations
